SEARCH
Package item.inventory

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
item.inventory.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
Represents an inventory system The inventory includes predefined slots for specific item categories: Slot 1: Weapon Slot 2: Helmet Slot 3: Chestplate Slot 4: Leggings Slot 5: Boots Slot 6: Shield

    Constructs an instance of the Inventory class.

  • Constructor Details

    • Inventory

      public Inventory()
      Constructs an instance of the Inventory class. Initializes predefined slots in the inventory, each associated with a specific item type.

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public boolean addItem(Item item)
      Attempts to add an item to the first inventory slot that can accept the item, by iterating through all available slots.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to be added to the inventory
      Returns:
      true if the item is successfully added to a compatible slot, false otherwise

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(Item itemToRemove)
      Removes the specified item from the inventory if it exists. Method checks for item existence by iterating through all slots.
      Parameters:
      itemToRemove - the item to be removed from the inventory; if null, the method does nothing

    • selectSlot

      public void selectSlot(int slotNumber)
      Selects the specified inventory slot.
      Parameters:
      slotNumber - the number of the slot to be selected; must exist within the inventory slots

    • getSelectedSlot

      public int getSelectedSlot()

    • removeSelectedItem

      public Item removeSelectedItem()
      Removes the item from the currently selected slot
      Returns:
      the removed item from the currently selected slot, or null if the slot is either not selected or empty

    • getSelectedItem

      public Item getSelectedItem()
      Retrieves item from currently selected slot.
      Returns:
      the item in the currently selected inventory slot, or null if the slot is empty or invalid

    • getItemInSlot

      public Item getItemInSlot(int slotNumber)
      Retrieves the item stored in the specified inventory slot.
      Parameters:
      slotNumber - the number of the slot to query; must correspond to an existing slot
      Returns:
      the item in the specified slot, or null if the slot is empty or does not exist

    • isSlotEmpty

      public boolean isSlotEmpty(int slotNumber)
      Checks whether the specified inventory slot is empty.
      Parameters:
      slotNumber - the index of the inventory slot to check; must correspond to an existing slot in the inventory
      Returns:
      true if the slot is either null or empty, false otherwise

    • getSlots

      public Map<Integer,InventorySlot<? extends Item>> getSlots()
